Ext.ux.TouchCalendar by SwarmOnline

Ext.ux.TouchCalendar is an extension and series of related plugins that allow a calendar component to be integrated into Sencha Touch applications.

Documentation

Online Documentation

Examples

Ext.ux.TouchCalendar
Ext.ux.TouchCalendarView
Ext.ux.TouchCalendarSimpleEvents
Ext.ux.TouchCalendarEvents
Ext.ux.TouchCalendarSimpleEvents with linked list
Ext.ux.TouchCalendarEvents with linked list

Authors

Stuart Ashworth (stuart@stuartashworth.com)

Contact

SwarmOnline (info@swarmonline.com)

Download

You can download this project in either zip or tar formats.

You can also clone the project with Git by running: 

$ git clone git://github.com/SwarmOnline/Ext.ux.TouchCalendar

get the source code on GitHub : SwarmOnline/Ext.ux.TouchCalendar
